title: New: Isle of Indigo – Paycheck
body:
A self-proclaimed ‘cruise ship anthem’, **Isle Of Indigo’s** _Paycheck_ is one of the most colourful debuts in quite some time.

Merging the funky nature of Jungle, with the melodies of HONNE (can I say it sounds a little like Jamiroqui?), it’s over the top and undoubtedly moorish from the so far anonymous project. Already supported by the likes of Disclosure and TALA, here’s hoping for plenty more like this. Check it out below.
